Conference Room

Tallinn

Area 44 m2
For up to 35 peaople
Order conference room
Tallinn Conference Room

The Tallinn conference hall is appropriate for medium- sized functions. It occupies 44m2 of floor space and can accommodate up to 35 participants.

Rental rate for the whole day
Service expenses; VAT
Paper & pens
Multimedia projector
Screen, flip chart
WiFi Internet
Photos
3D Tour

Conference and Banquet Center offers:

  • 8 modern and functional conference, meeting and banquet halls with a total capacity of 1200m2 and 1100 people at your disposal
  • Available: LCD screen, whiteboard with paper and markers, stationery and note paper
  • Daylight in all event halls
  • Catering services - breakfast, lunch, dinner, coffee breaks
  • Standard technical equipment - wireless internet, sound and sound insulation system, audiovisual equipment
  • We also offer off-site coffee breaks, lunch, dinner and banquets. • Special prices for accommodation and special offers on the hotel website "Bellevue Park Hotel Riga" service will be the key to success for any of your events!

Restaurant PRIMAVERA is located on the ground floor of the hotel. This is also where we serve breakfast for the guests. Daily restaurant PRIMAVERA offers a range of Italian dishes cooked using traditional recipes from regional Italy. We offer pizza, pasta, appetisers and salads.

Convenience Meets Comfort

Just minutes from the airport and steps from Old Town Riga, our hotel offers the perfect blend of modern convenience and historic charm. Book your stay with us now and experience the best of Riga.
